post.summary: Get installation features with additional filters
post.description: Gets all features from installation with additional filters

regex.description: regular expression query for returning only matched features

filter.description: filter the returned features by the name. Supported wildcards: N (number of room, heating circuit etc.), * (any text)

skipDisabled.description: indicates whether return or not disabled features

skipNotReady.description: indicates whether return or not not ready features

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: regular expression query for returning only matched features

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: feature names passed in a form of array to filter the returned features by the name

parameters.name: skipDisabled
parameters.description: indicates whether return or not disabled features

parameters.name: skipNotReady
parameters.description: indicates whether return or not not ready features

post.summary: Get gateway's device features with additional filters
post.description: Gets all features from gateway's device with additional filters

regex.description: regular expression query for returning only matched features

filter.description: filter the returned features by the name. Supported wildcards: N (number of room, heating circuit etc.), * (any text)

skipDisabled.description: indicates whether return or not disabled features

skipNotReady.description: indicates whether return or not not ready features

get.description: Gets all features from gateway's device

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: regular expression query for returning only matched features

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: feature names passed in a form of array to filter the returned features by the name

parameters.name: skipDisabled
parameters.description: indicates whether return or not disabled features

parameters.name: skipNotReady
parameters.description: indicates whether return or not not ready features

get.description: Gets selected feature from installation gateway device

post.summary: Execute installation gateway device feature command
post.description:
Sends command to the installation gateway's device feature with Feature Permissions verification (Feature permissions in vNext).
Users of the Viessmann Developer Portal can access this endpoint with a paid subscription plan that includes write access.

post.summary: Get gateway features with additional filters
post.description: Gets all features from gateway with additional filters

regex.description: regular expression query for returning only matched features

filter.description: filter the returned features by the name. Supported wildcards: N (number of room, heating circuit etc.), * (any text)

skipDisabled.description: indicates whether return or not disabled features

skipNotReady.description: indicates whether return or not not ready features

includeDevicesFeatures.description: indicates whether return or not devices' features; if this is set to true, the disabled features will be filtered out

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: regular expression query for returning only matched features

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: feature names passed in a form of array to filter the returned features by the name

parameters.name: skipDisabled
parameters.description: indicates whether return or not disabled features

parameters.name: skipNotReady
parameters.description: indicates whether return or not not ready features

parameters.name: includeDevicesFeatures
parameters.description: indicates whether return or not devices' features; if this is set to true, the disabled features will be filtered out

get.description: Gets selected feature from installation gateway

post.description:
Sends command to the installation gateway's feature with Feature Permissions verification (Feature permissions in vNext).
Users of the Viessmann Developer Portal can access this endpoint with a paid subscription plan that includes write access.
